mapper.sql: AC_ALLIN_ID, AC_PAY_NUM, AC_PAY_NUMEX, AC_BATCH_ID, AC_MERCHANT_ID, AC_MERCHANT_NAME, AC_EQUIMENT_ID, AC_BANK_NAME, AC_ACCOUNT_TYPE, AC_ACCOUNT_NUM, AC_EXCHANGE_TYPE, AC_EXCHANGE_STATUES, AC_EXCHANGE_SOURCENUM, AC_EXCHANGE_REALNUM, AC_DISCOUNT_NUM, AC_ORGAN_PAYNUM, AC_MERCHANT_PAYNUM, AC_COOPORGAN_ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME
mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO T_ETC_ACTIVITYDATA_ALLINPAY( AC_PAY_NUM, AC_PAY_NUMEX, AC_BATCH_ID, AC_MERCHANT_ID, AC_MERCHANT_NAME, AC_EQUIMENT_ID, AC_BANK_NAME, AC_ACCOUNT_TYPE, AC_ACCOUNT_NUM, AC_EXCHANGE_TYPE, AC_EXCHANGE_STATUES, AC_EXCHANGE_SOURCENUM, AC_EXCHANGE_REALNUM, AC_DISCOUNT_NUM, AC_ORGAN_PAYNUM, AC_MERCHANT_PAYNUM, AC_COOPORGAN_ID, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME ) VALUES( #{item.acPayNum}, #{item.acPayNumex}, #{item.acBatchId}, #{item.acMerchantId}, #{item.acMerchantName}, #{item.acEquimentId}, #{item.acBankName}, #{item.acAccountType}, #{item.acAccountNum}, #{item.acExchangeType}, #{item.acExchangeStatues}, #{item.acExchangeSourcenum}, #{item.acExchangeRealnum}, #{item.acDiscountNum}, #{item.acOrganPaynum}, #{item.acMerchantPaynum}, #{item.acCooporganId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.modifyTime} )
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
mapper.select: SELECT allinpay.AC_MERCHANT_ID as "AC_MERCHANT_ID", allinpay.AC_MERCHANT_NAME as "MER_NAME", MAX(allinpay.AC_DISCOUNT_NUM) as "DISCOUNT_NUM", COUNT(case when allinpay.AC_EXCHANGE_STATUES='处理成功' then 1 else null end) -COUNT( case when allinpay.AC_EXCHANGE_STATUES='已撤销' then 1 else null end) as "CHECK_NUM", SUM(case when allinpay.AC_EXCHANGE_STATUES='处理成功' then allinpay.AC_EXCHANGE_SOURCENUM else 0 end) -SUM(case when allinpay.AC_EXCHANGE_STATUES='已撤销' then allinpay.AC_EXCHANGE_SOURCENUM else 0 end) as BANK_AMOUNT, COUNT(1) as ACTIVE_USER_COUNT FROM T_ETC_ACTIVITYDATA_ALLINPAY allinpay WHERE allinpay.AC_BATCH_ID=#{acBatchId} AND allinpay.CREATE_TIME BETWEEN #{reStartTime} and #{reEndTime} GROUP BY allinpay.AC_MERCHANT_ID,allinpay.AC_MERCHANT_NAME
